@MrChillr @BrianODriscoll @kendoherty1997 @RanelaghLife That Giant being Fr Tony Coote. PP of Mount Merrion & Kilmacud & recently diagnosed with Motor Neuron disease at 53. Fund raising walks this summer, 1st up is 3pm in Deerpark on Sunday @walkwhileyoucan #support

@ggandnewsance @peterrobinson86 @ballsdotie In that same game (2 years ago) my son went down with a head injury (knee to head in tackle - I did not see). After 90 seconds on the ground & medical attention both that referee & medic cleared him to play on. My son took himself of 5 mins later as was feeling groggy #concussion
